Field Label: RADx-rad Study ID; Subject ID; Datavent ID
What is your race? Mark one or more boxes.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, American Indian or Alaska Native | 2, Asian | 3, Black or African American | 4, Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander | 5, White | 6, Some other race

Field Label: Are you of Hispanic or Latino origin?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Yes, of Hispanic or Latino origin | 0, No, not of Hispanic or Latino origin

Field Note: Age in years. For babies less than 1 year old, write 0 as the age

Field Label: What is your biological sex assigned at birth?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Male | 2, Female | 3, Intersex | 4, None of these describe me

Field Label: How many years of education have you completed?

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Employed in a permanent position | 2, Employed in a temporary position | 3, Not currently employed

Field Label: What kind of health insurance do you have?
Are you deaf or do you have serious difficulty hearing?
Are you blind or do you have serious difficulty seeing, even when wearing glasses?
Because of a physical, mental, or emotional condition, do you have serious difficulty concentrating, remembering, or making decisions?
Do you have serious difficulty walking or climbing stairs?
Do you have difficulty dressing or bathing?
Because of a physical, mental, or emotional condition, do you have difficulty doing errands alone such as visiting a doctor's office or shopping?
Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing
New loss of taste or smell
Would you say that (your) health in general is excellent, very good, good, fair or poor?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Excellent | 2, Very good | 3, Good | 4, Fair | 5, Poor
